item.title: Come unto Christ—Living as Latter-day Saints
item.description:
Come unto Christ—Living as Latter-day Saints by Elder John A. McCune, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 190th Annual General Conference on Tue Mar 31 2020
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder John A. McCune, Of the Seventy

item.title: Joy Through Covenant Discipleship
item.description:
Joy Through Covenant Discipleship by Elder John A. McCune, Of the Seventy given in Sunday Morning of 195th Annual General Conference on Mon Mar 31 2025
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
